description:
'Spells & Secrets' offers a deep and motivating Rogue-Lite experience that invites everyone into the fascinating world of adventure and magic. Liberate Greifenstein's Wizard Academy from magical creatures by creatively using your spells. Explore this modern magical world alone or in local co-op mode with friends and family, customize your character, solve mysteries, and find powerful artifacts.

CREATIVE USE OF SPELLS
Utilize a variety of spells creatively to combat magical creatures or solve puzzles.

LOCAL CO-OP MODE
If you're tired of playing alone, invite a friend to discover 'Spells & Secrets' in local co-op.

CHARACTER EDITOR
Dive deep into character customization and unlock more possibilities with a variety of options.

Are you ready for the adventure? Dive into the world of 'Spells & Secrets' now and unleash your magical powers!
name: Spells & Secrets
